about_the_game:
東方幕華祭 ~ Fantastic Danmaku Festival Soundtrack.
There are 15 tracks (MP3 format).

01 Scattered candlelight ~ Candlelight
02 Dark girl
03 The rhythm of ice on the lake
04 Fairy's back to the lake ~ A dare
05 Mansion of dream ~ East castle
06 Cloud sweeper ~ Kongfu storm
07 The sleeping bibliotheca ~ The library in silence
08 The glamorous waltz ~ The little devil dance
09 The gallery of clocks ~ Flowing time
10 The battle field ~ Bell tower
11 The scarlet lord ~ The master of red moon
12 Endless fate
13 Makuka Sai ~ The scarlet moon
14 The ghost story of Centennial girl
15 Who else is stained with blood ~ Who cares
